metadata.title: CVE-2024-43866 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Always drain health in shutdown callbackThere is no point in recovery during device shutdown. if healthwork started need to wait for it to avoid races and NULL pointeraccess.Hence, drain health WQ on shutdown callback.
